repositories.author: curl
repositories.name: curl
repositories.description: A command line tool and library for transferring data with URL syntax, supporting DICT, FILE, FTP, FTPS, GOPHER, GOPHERS, HTTP, HTTPS, IMAP, IMAPS, LDAP, LDAPS, MQTT, POP3, POP3S, RTMP, RTMPS, RTSP, SCP, SFTP, SMB, SMBS, SMTP, SMTPS, TELNET, TFTP, WS and WSS. libcurl offers a myriad of powerful features

repositories.author: git
repositories.name: git
repositories.description: Git Source Code Mirror - This is a publish-only repository but pull requests can be turned into patches to the mailing list via GitGitGadget (https://gitgitgadget.github.io/). Please follow Documentation/SubmittingPatches procedure for any of your improvements.

repositories.author: pocoproject
repositories.name: poco
repositories.description: The POCO C++ Libraries are powerful cross-platform C++ libraries for building network- and internet-based applications that run on desktop, server, mobile, IoT, and embedded systems.

repositories.author: Mbed-TLS
repositories.name: mbedtls
repositories.description: An open source, portable, easy to use, readable and flexible TLS library, and reference implementation of the PSA Cryptography API. Releases are on a varying cadence, typically around 3 - 6 months between releases.

repositories.author: analogdevicesinc
repositories.name: no-OS
repositories.description: Software drivers in C for systems without an operating system

repositories.author: unicorn-engine
repositories.name: unicorn
repositories.description: Unicorn CPU emulator framework (ARM, AArch64, M68K, Mips, Sparc, PowerPC, RiscV, S390x, TriCore, X86)

repositories.author: NVIDIA
repositories.name: open-gpu-kernel-modules
repositories.description: NVIDIA Linux open GPU kernel module source

repositories.author: esnet
repositories.name: iperf
repositories.description: iperf3: A TCP, UDP, and SCTP network bandwidth measurement tool

repositories.author: sqlcipher
repositories.name: sqlcipher
repositories.description: SQLCipher is a standalone fork of SQLite that adds 256 bit AES encryption of database files and other security features.

repositories.author: redcanaryco
repositories.name: atomic-red-team
repositories.description: Small and highly portable detection tests based on MITRE's ATT&CK.
